# 6.1
0.3 0.1 0.025 0.3 .125 .15
.3+.1+.025+.3+.125+.15=1
.1 .55 .35
.1+.55+.35=1
.05/.1=0.5
.025/.1=0.25
.025/.1=0.25
.05/.1+.025/.1+.025/.1=1
.2/.55=0.363636
.05/.55=0.090909
.3/.55=0.545455
.1/.35=0.285714
.1/.35=0.285714
.15/.35=0.428571
0/.3=0
.2/.3=0.666667
.1/.3=0.333333
.05/.1=0.5
.05/.1=0.5
0/.1=0
.025/.025=1
0/.025=0
0/.025=0
0/.3=0
.3/.3=1
0/.3=0
.025/.125=0.2
0/.125=0
.1/.125=0.8
0/.15=0
0/.15=0
.15/.15=1

# 6.3
3A 2B 1C 3D 1E
p(0,0) = (4!/(2!*2!))/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.133333
p(0,1) = 1*4/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.088889
p(0,2) = 0
p(1,0) = 4*4/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.355556
p(1,1) = (4+4)/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.177778
p(1,2) = 1/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.022222
p(2,0) = (4!/(2!*2!))/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.133333
p(2,1) = 4/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.088889
p(2,2) = 0
p(x=0) = 0.133333+0.088889=0.222222
p(x=1) = 0.355556+0.177778+0.022222=0.555556
p(x=2) = 0.133333+0.088889=0.222222
p(y=0) = 0.133333+0.355556+0.133333=0.622222
p(y=1) = 0.088889+0.177778+0.088889=0.355556
p(y=2) = 0.022222=0.022222
1/(10!/(8!*2!))

# 6.5
p_2(y|x)

p(x=1) = 1/3
p(x=2) = 1/3
p(x=3) = 1/3

p(1,30) = .06*1/3=0.02
p(1,40) = .24*1/3=0.08
p(1,50) = .24*1/3=0.08
p(1,50) = .46*1/3=0.153333
p(2,30) = .10*1/3=0.033333
p(2,40) = .24*1/3=0.08
p(2,50) = .36*1/3=0.12
p(2,50) = .30*1/3=0.1
p(3,30) = .15*1/3=0.05
p(3,40) = .18*1/3=0.06
p(3,50) = .30*1/3=0.1
p(3,50) = .37*1/3=0.123333

# 6.7
p(y = 0) = .11
p(y = 1) = .25
p(y = 2) = .40
p(y = 3) = .24

p_1(x=2) = .40
p_2(0|2) = .07/.40=0.175
p_2(1|2) = .10/.40=0.25
p_2(2|2) = .15/.40=0.375
p_2(3|2) = .08/.40=0.2

# 6.15
.09*.36 + .25*.36 + .25*.36 + .25=0.4624

# 6.21
1*1/3 + 2*1/3 + 3*1/3 = 2
30*(0.02+0.033333+0.05)+40*(0.08+0.08+0.06)+50*(0.08+0.12+0.1)+60*(0.153333+0.1+0.123333)=49.49995

# 6.29
no

# 6.31
no, p(0,2) != p_1(0)*p_2(2)

# 6.33
.01/2=0.005
.02/2=0.01
.02/2=0.01
.95/2=0.475
.002/2=0.001
.002/2=0.001
.996/2=0.498
